name: Cinnamon Basil Chocolate Mousse
keywords: cinnamon basil, unsweetened chocolate, whipping cream, dessert, gluten-free
recipeIngredient: 2 cups cinnamon basil whipped cream (see recipe)

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan, melt chocolate with 1/4 cup sugar and 1/4 cup hot water, stirring until smooth. Beat egg yolks and stir into chocolate. Remove saucepan from heat.

Beat egg whites, gradually adding remaining 1/4 cup sugar, until peaks form. Fold egg whites into chocolate. Fold 1 1/4 cups cinnamon basil whipped cream into chocolate. Pour mixture into ramekins or glasses and chill for 3 hours. Top with remaining whipped cream and serve.
